name: First St
description: A charming street that connects the bustling downtown area with the quiet residential neighborhoods. You are on First St, a clean, tree-lined street that serves as a vital link in the heart of Hill Valley. To the west, Hill St disappears into a neighborhood of charming homes, while to the east, First St continues its journey towards Hubbard Ave. To the north, the beautiful Courthouse Square Park offers a place for rest and recreation. To the south, the grand Essex Theater promises a night of entertainment.
